long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Search Shortcuts Extension
Streamline your web searches with custom shortcuts!

Tired of typing long search queries or site-specific searches repeatedly? With the Google Search Shortcuts extension, you can create, edit, and manage personalized shortcuts that instantly replace keywords with longer text during searches.

✨ Key Features:

• Custom Shortcuts: Quickly replace keywords (e.g., !r) with specific search patterns (e.g., site:www.reddit.com).
• Toggle Shortcuts On/Off: Enable or disable your shortcuts with a simple switch.
• Shortcut Management: Easily create, edit, or delete shortcuts on the fly.
• Light & Dark Mode Support
• Enhanced Productivity: Works directly in the search bar and Google Search results for faster, more efficient searches.

Whether you’re a student, developer, or just love optimizing your workflow, this extension makes repetitive searches a thing of the past!
